Steven Hawkes wrote:
> 
> I am using the graphical version of JUnit and was wondering
> if it is possible to get a hardcopy or file based report on
> a test run.
> 
> Obviousy for a successful run this is only the number of runs
> but for a failure this would be the list of errors.

Do you *need* to run the graphical version?  Why not run textui and
capture the output? Or run it out of Ant, which has very flexible
reporting?
